title: Milton woman charged in 7-year-old child's self-inflicted shooting
content:
A Milton woman was arrested Tuesday night in connection with the accidental shooting of a 7-year-old child, according to the Santa Rosa County Sheriff's Office.
Mary Carolina Mabire, 28, has been charged with child neglect, unsafe storage of a firearm and culpable negligence for an incident in the 4900 block of Trailer Park Court on Saturday. The child suffered a self-inflicted gunshot wound after finding an unsecured firearm in the residence.
The juvenile is currently recovering from non-life threatening wounds.
Mabire is being held in Santa Rosa County Jail without bond.
